document.full_text: inspections at u.s. nuclear plants following the disaster at japan's fukushima daiichi facility have raised questions about their readiness to deal with extreme events, the head of the nuclear safety regulator said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. nuclear regulator raises questions after fukushima
lines_and_colors: inspections at u.s. nuclear plants following the disaster at japan's fukushima daiichi facility have raised questions about their readiness to deal with extreme events, the head of the nuclear safety regulator said on wednesday.
